body_text:
About the quotes: This code is outside of the add-on, and so doesn't use the Firefox eslint configs. It is tied more closely to the rest of our Javascript  that for historical reasons prefers single quotes. It's a weird situation, but eslint helps 😄.
Nice catch on the test-mismatch though. I'll fix that up.
body:
About the quotes: This code is outside of the add-on, and so doesn't use the Firefox eslint configs. It is tied more closely to the rest of our Javascript  that for historical reasons prefers single quotes. It's a weird situation, but eslint helps 😄.

Nice catch on the test-mismatch though. I'll fix that up.
body_html:
About the quotes: This code is outside of the add-on, and so doesn't use the Firefox eslint configs. It is tied more closely to the rest of our Javascript that for historical reasons prefers single quotes. It's a weird situation, but eslint helps 😄.

Nice catch on the test-mismatch though. I'll fix that up.
